snippet.title: In The Drink - A lonely researcher spends Christmas at the bottom of the ocean!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://ryantrawick.itch.io/in-the-drink?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Are you ready to dive into a world of adventure and excitement?

Set on Christmas Eve, players take control of a deep-sea researcher and her trusty submarine to scour the depths and save aquatic creatures in need.

With a retro-inspired aesthetic and challenging metroidvania-style gameplay, In The Drink is the perfect addition to any gamer's collection.

➡️ More from Ryan Trawick https://ryantrawick.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
